name: Personalized Budget Coaching
tagline: Empowering you to take control of your financial life
body:
## Let me help you secure your financial future.

Tired of living pay check to pay check? Wonder where your money is going? I want to be your financial coach. I only provide adviceâ€”no insurance, no investments, no get rich quick schemes. Review my philosophy of coaching and my credentials for being a coach (clickable links for both of these). Your financial well-being is my only concern. Look at the different services that I offer. Then contact me for my inexpensive pricing structure. We can meet in person, by phone or through Skype to get you on the road to financial freedom.

#### Learn to Budget

People who do not budget do not win.

#### Philosophy

I do not sell any product or services. I provide advice that is unbiased.

#### Build Wealth

If you practice the principles I show you (the same as those taught by Dave Ramsey) you will build wealth and retire with dignity.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
